page.title: 17WARNDON MOTORWAY DIVISION 2
page.content: On the motorway asphalt is used but on the country roads(main roads) asphalt or "layering" course is used.The tarmac used to surface the roads is taken from the quarries, put on the roads and then a machine spreads the tarmac out and flattens it. {DAMAGES ON THE ROAD}-The accidents on the roads often cause damages, which are the responsibility of the roadworks department- for example if a fence is broken the men have to mend it. Signs are often stolen or vandalised or they are moved. {UNUSUAL HAPPENINGS}-The roadworks department find stray animals on the motorway and also vehicles on the wrong side of the road, both of these are highly dangerous!If there ever are any animals on the roads the traffic is stopped immediately to prevent an accident from occuring.
